example.eg: He tried to justify his rudeness by saying he'd been tired.
example.egtrans: 他试图为自己的无礼辩解，说是他累了。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 证明…合理, 证明…正当

example.eg: I tried to justify the price of house to my husband, but he said it was not a good value.
If you justify the text it will look neater.
I think my high marks justify my decision to take fewer classes.
example.egtrans: 我认为我的高分证明了我少选课程的决定是正确的。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 证明…有道理, 证明…正确
